page.title: 11LIFE IN COFFINSWELL
page.content: The population has changed a lot over the past few years. Years ago there was a school and the cottage called Appledoor was a shop.Now there is no demand for them because children are educated in Newton Abbot and people shop at "Tesco Super Store"in Kingsteignton.Business people living in the village work in Newton Abbot.People of Coffinswell are middle class citizens compared with the people of Kingskerswell.The land surrounding Coffinswell is rented or owned by people who live in the area.The area is not the sort of place where tourists would go out on the town and buy sticks of rock.Anyone visiting the area would go in for things like horse riding or walking The area in & around Coffinswell is picturesque,quiet & pleasant. By Joanna Lindon
